events.message: Received the application for the Software Engineer position from candidate John Doe. The resume showcases strong experience in backend development and relevant technologies.
Categorised the candidate under Engineering after reviewing the application and confirming skills relevant to our software development needs.
Assigned recruiter Jane Smith to manage the candidate's hiring process for the Software Engineer position.
Conducted initial screening call with candidate to discuss experience, technical skills, and motivation for the Software Engineer role.
Received candidate's confirmation and enthusiasm to proceed with technical interview scheduling as per proposed times.
Scheduled the technical interview for May 5th, 2024 at 10 AM UTC with the engineering panel for in-depth evaluation.
Technical interview completed successfully with positive feedback regarding problem solving skills and coding proficiency.
Scheduled HR interview for the candidate on May 7th to discuss company culture, benefits, and overall fit.
HR interview concluded with positive candidate attitude and alignment with company values.
Extended formal offer to candidate including salary, benefits, and start date expectations.
Received positive feedback from candidate expressing excitement about the offer and intention to accept.
Candidate accepted the offer formally and confirmed the agreed starting date and onboarding plans.
Initiated onboarding process with all required training sessions and equipment arranged for the new Software Engineer.
Successfully closed the hiring process with the candidate fully onboarded and productive within the engineering team.
